Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½A bittersweet meditation on aging and the salad days of youth, Rolling like a Stone speaks volumes of truth in one thoughtful, languid hour. If this is how documentary is done in Scandinavia, then sign me up for the satellite dish.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½
